ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I played for 3 hours last night and I did not notice a change to the duration of SOW or our buffs.  The jboots effect, however, does not seem to last
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I played for 3 hours last night and I did not notice a change to the
duration of SOW or our buffs. The jboots effect, however, does not seem to
last quite as long as before.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 10:19 AM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] New Patch
>
>
> From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> Thanks for sending it, as I said I did not see it yet, I agree it doesn't
> appear to say anything about the buffs being changed, but I spoke
> to another
> cleric and a ranger who are high level and the rangers SoW which used to
> last 25 minutes was only lasting for 10 minutes now and the
> cleric stated
> "he was wondering why everyone kept asking for resolution so often"
> So, i haven't seen this first hand just going on what I was told.
>
>
>
> >I may be wrong, but I don't see any mention of any cleric spell or buff
> >change. Nor do I see any SoW change.
>
>
